resources.string: We, ROYAL CAREER SERVICES, is a fast growing Executive Search Company of highly specialized and seasoned Consultants and Managers who understand your need for Human Capital. We started operations in March2011 with clients all over Mumbai. We are specialized in operating for various industries viz. BFSI, MEDIA, REAL ESTATE, HOSPITALITY, MARINE/SHIPPING, MANUFACTURING. We are growing at an unprecedented pace. Our growth has been backed by our extensive research capabilities, database of clients and candidates armed of offer the best.
